share.invite: Let us plan together with Wacken Group Line Up Planner

message.generic: {n} has invited you to join their space.
message.specific: {n} has invited you to join a space called "{s}".

whoAreYou.title: Who are you?
message: You can add yourself to the members of this space
or choose an already created persona from the list.
Sign in to create and edit your plan
and share it with your friends.

mail.title: Login via mail
message: Sign in to create and edit your plan
and share it with your friends.

sortTime.label: Sort chronological
sortTime.description: Show upcoming acts at the top

removeMember.title: Delete forever
removeMember.message: Do you really want to remove this member?

leaveSpace.title: Leave space
leaveSpace.message: Du you really want to leave this space? Your data will be deleted.

anonLogOut.title: Log out forever
anonLogOut.message: If you sign out of your anonymous account, your favorites can only be managed with the invitation link. Do you really want to log out? You'll never be able to log in again.

deleteAccount.title: Delete forever
deleteAccount.message: Du you really want to delete your account? All data associated with your account is going to be deleted aswell.

relogin.title: Log in again
relogin.message: You need to log in again to be able to delete your account.

invitationLink.title: Share invitation link
invitationLink.message: Your friends can join your space with the following link:

login-needed.title: Login required
login-needed.message: Log in or ask for a invitation link for an existing space to save your favorites.
